name: Interface Scoring
description: Scoring template for Interface super-sector patents. Includes interface standard and interoperability metrics.

questions.question: How relevant is this to interface standards (PCIe, USB4, HDMI, DisplayPort, CXL, NVMe, etc.)? Consider standard essentiality potential.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify relevant interface standards and degree of alignment.

questions.question: Rate the interoperability benefits this technology provides. Consider cross-platform compatibility, backward compatibility, and ecosystem adoption.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe interoperability benefits and compatibility considerations.

questions.question: How does this patent improve signal integrity, error correction, or data transmission reliability?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe signal integrity improvements and techniques.
